snippet: As Mexico’s presidential election is held on Sunday, few are hopeful that it will make a significant difference in the country’s drug-cartel violence, no matter who wins.
lead_paragraph: As Mexico’s presidential election is held on Sunday, few are hopeful that it will make a significant difference in the country’s drug-cartel violence, no matter who wins.

headline.seo: Few Expect Drug Violence to Lessen After Mexico’s Election
headline.main: Few Expect a Positive Change in Drug Violence After Mexico’s Election
headline.print_headline: Few Expect a Positive Change in Drug Violence After Mexico’s Election
